query.default: select * from Sungero_Reports_Acquaintance temp where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId

query.mssql: create table {0} ([ReportSessionId] varchar(256) NOT NULL, [TaskDisplayName] nvarchar(max), [TaskId] int, [TaskHyperlink] nvarchar(max), [RowNumber] int, [ShortName] nvarchar(max), [LastName] nvarchar(max), [JobTitle] nvarchar(max), [Department] nvarchar(max), [AcquaintanceDate] nvarchar(max), [State] nvarchar(max), [Note] nvarchar(max), [AssignmentId] nvarchar(max), [AssignmentHyperlink] nvarchar(max))
query.postgres: create table {0} (ReportSessionId citext NOT NULL, TaskDisplayName citext, TaskId int, TaskHyperlink citext, RowNumber int, ShortName citext, LastName citext, JobTitle citext, Department citext, AcquaintanceDate citext, State citext, Note citext, AssignmentId citext, AssignmentHyperlink citext)
